title: PBE Account
body: I have been trying to make a PBE account because I was accepted and it wont let me it says ERROR: 500 So I am very confused and I WANNA PLAY PBE HALP

replies.body: is there a way I can give u the info I would like to use and u do it for me?
This is currently a known issue, where some players are getting errors accessing the PBE site.  I don't have any updates to offer right now, but I'm keeping an eye out.  Hang tight!
